column4: Can anyone tell me what i need to do to get 2D accelleration and TV-out on my geforce 420 go? Should i install the standard nvidia drivers or use drivers from ubuntu?
ubuntu drivers are OK, easier to install (type !nvidia for a guide link)

a regular driver is the newest one from nvidia.com . the ubuntu driver is still regular, but not the newest, it is easier to install, and your system won't crash after every kernel update (you need to reinstall nvidia.com drivers after every update). its simply better :)
